sentences.en: Beneath the festive mood there is an underlying apprehension.
sentences.cn: 在喜庆的背后存在着隐忧。

sentences.en: Beneath the sentimental psychobabble, there's a likeable movie trying to get out.
sentences.cn: 在多愁善感的心理学呓语之下，一部本有可能受到喜爱的电影挣扎欲出。

sentences.en: Far beneath them, the trees of the forest sighed in the breeze.
sentences.cn: 远在他们的下方，森林中的树木在微风中悲泣。

sentences.en: Five firemen narrowly escaped death when a staircase collapsed beneath their feet.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的一段楼梯坍塌时,5名消防队员险些丧命。

sentences.en: He roused himself from his lazy contemplation of the scene beneath him.
sentences.cn: 他不再懒洋洋地注视着下面的景色。

sentences.en: He was standing on the bridge looking at the river beneath.
sentences.cn: 他站在桥上，看着下面的河水。

sentences.en: His legs were curled beneath him in a foetal position.
sentences.cn: 他的腿蜷缩在身下，就像胎儿的姿势一样。

sentences.en: His tendons stood out like rope beneath his skin.
sentences.cn: 他皮肤下的筋腱像绳索一样暴突出来。

sentences.en: Jo enjoyed feeling the warm sand beneath her feet.
sentences.cn: 乔很喜欢脚下踩着温暖沙子的感觉。

sentences.en: Lowered sea levels exposed the shallow continental shelf beneath the Bering Sea.
sentences.cn: 海平面下降使白令海底部的浅层大陆架暴露出来。

sentences.en: Many find themselves having to take jobs far beneath them.
sentences.cn: 很多人觉得自己在工作上被迫大材小用。

sentences.en: On a shelf beneath he spotted a photo album.
sentences.cn: 他在下面的架子上瞅见了一本相册。

sentences.en: Some roofs collapsed beneath the weight of (=  unable to support the weight of  ) so much snow.
sentences.cn: 有些房子的屋顶不堪积雪的重压塌陷了。

sentences.en: Somewhere deep beneath the surface lay a caring character.
sentences.cn: 在内心深处的某个角落里埋藏着一颗爱心。

sentences.en: Stowage is provided in lined lockers beneath the berths.
sentences.cn: 铺位下方有成排的储物柜可以存放东西。

sentences.en: The doctor worked busily beneath the blinding lights of the delivery room.
sentences.cn: 这位医生在产房刺目的灯光下忙碌着。

sentences.en: The dolphins disappeared beneath the waves.
sentences.cn: 海豚消失在波涛中。

sentences.en: The flagstones beneath their feet were worn smooth by centuries of use.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的石板路经过数百年的踩踏，磨得光溜溜的。

sentences.en: The fortress on the hill covered the harbour area beneath.
sentences.cn: 山上的炮楼把下面的海港地区置于射程之内。

sentences.en: The ground beneath us, however, appears solid and unchanging.
sentences.cn: 然而，我们脚下的地面却似乎是坚实而恒久不变的。

sentences.en: The groundwater is only feet beneath the city streets.
sentences.cn: 地下河距离上面的城市街道只有几英尺。

sentences.en: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.cn: 现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

sentences.en: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.cn: 他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！

trans.tran_en: in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something
in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something
